EmailTemplate.subject: turboticker for IT Pros | Get Your VMT-Shirt | EMC VNX Control | Wahl Review | May 2014
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
VMTurbo Turboticker | May 2014 Rockin' VMTurbo's Operations Manager with UCS Integration: http://wahlnetwork.com/2014/05/08/rockin-vmturbos-operations-manager-ucs-integration Free Virtual Health Monitoring Tool Download Free Virtual Health Monitor: <http://bit.ly/1hdGf1C> Download VMTurbo Virtual Health Monitor today, absolutely free <http://bit.ly/1hdGf1C>. Virtual Health Monitor installs on any hypervisor(s), provides real-time performance monitoring, and scales automatically as your environment grows. Gain visibility, and download .pdf efficiency and performance reports at any time. Virtual Health Monitor is freeware, and yours to keep forever. We call it "Forevereeware". Introducing EMC VNX Control
VMTurbo's Storage Control Extension, which provides end-to-end visibility and control between virtual applications and their underlying storage arrays, now supports integration with EMC VNX Series, in addition to NetApp ONTAP arrays. Learn More About Storage Control... <http://bit.ly/1nlC7R9> VMT-Shirts Still Available
You already wear your heart on your sleeve. Why not wear your Green Circle on your chest? These Limited Edition VMT-Shirts are going fast, and when we run out, we'll likely concoct another irreverent tagline and print more. But still. Complete a Demo of VMTurbo Operations Manager in your own environment, and get yours. Click for Details... <http://bit.ly/R1gxEb> #vHaiku: New Website Remember, things change. GeoCities ended, guys. New site coming soon <http://bit.ly/1jFcLKS>.
Try VMTurbo Free... <http://bit.ly/1obgItR> VALAR TURBOLIS. "All Men Must Turbo." <http://www.facebook.com/vmturbo1> <http://www.twitter.com/vmturbo> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/248491> no 234 street name. city name,country nameÂ Tel:01 234567890
